summary: "X2: X-Men United" is a 2003 superhero movie about a group of powerful mutants called the X-Men. In this film, a dangerous man named Colonel Stryker tries to destroy all mutants. To stop him, the X-Men must join forces with their enemies, the Brotherhood of Mutants. The movie stars famous actors like Hugh Jackman and Patrick Stewart. It's full of action and based on Marvel Comics, following the story from a graphic novel called "God Loves, Man Kills." The film was very popular and made a lot of money.
title: X2 (film)
